name: Dice Ninja
description:
Overview:

A 2D platformer game about a dice ninja who tries to restore true randomness before evil robots wreak havoc over the world. You must complete each level before the timer runs out. This is made easier by the Ninja's Dice powers, but they can only be activated after collecting enough chance orbs (the number of chance orbs you need is shown by the number on the die). 

Controls:

A and D (or arrow keys) to move

Spacebar to jump

Escape to return to menu
